meanings.definition: To breathe out air from the lungs.
meanings.sent1: After running, she was exhaling heavily.
meanings.sent2: He was exhaling slowly to calm himself down.
meanings.sent3: The balloon, after being popped, started exhaling air comically.
meanings.sent4: The chimney was exhaling smoke into the sky.
meanings.sent5: The dragon exhaling fire was a sight to behold.

meanings.sent1: The tea kettle was exhaling steam.
meanings.sent2: The volcano was exhaling ash and smoke.
meanings.sent3: The old car exhaling fumes made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The factory was exhaling pollution into the air.
meanings.sent5: The hot soup was exhaling a delicious aroma.
